mapper.select: select cno, ccontent from category Order by cno asc
select distinct c.cno, c.ccontent, b.murl from category c, board b where b.cno = c.cno and b.murl=#{murl} order by c.cno asc

SELECT cno, ccontent, ccount FROM(SELECT b.cno con, c.ccontent ccontent, c.cno, count(b.cno) ccount, count(c.ccontent), count(c.cno) FROM category c, board b WHERE c.cno = b.cno(+) GROUP BY b.cno, c.ccontent, c.cno ) ORDER BY cno ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET ccontent=#{editccontent} WHERE cno = #{cno}
